title: Stablecoin USDC Is Making a Comeback: Coinbase
description: Total market cap of the dollar-linked coin has increased faster than larger rival USDT's in recent months.

title: Bankrupt FTX and Alameda move over $8 million in assets amid market surge
description:
Crypto wallets associated with the now-defunct FTX exchange and its counterpart, Alameda Research, have moved over $8 million in digital assets in the past 24 hours amidst a surge in the broader crypto market. According to blockchain analytics firm SpotOnChain, these entities transferred 2,000 units of Ethereum, valued at around $6.36 million, to Coinbase and […]

The post Bankrupt FTX and Alameda move over $8 million in assets amid market surge appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Why ‘Owning 0.1 Bitcoin Is Actually a Big Deal’, Explains Popular Crypto Analyst
description: In a video released yesterday, prominent crypto analyst Lark Davis highlights the significant advantage individuals gain by owning even a small fraction of Bitcoin. He begins by addressing the common feeling of inadequacy that many might experience due to the ostentatious displays of wealth on social media. However, Davis emphasizes that such comparisons are misleading […]

title: Altcoins Pyth (PYTH) and Theta (THETA) follow BTC lead
description: The huge moves in the crypto market are not just unique to bitcoin. The latest move from $BTC has inspired big price rises among a select few among the altcoins. Pyth (PYTH) and Theta (THETA) are among the biggest gainers.

title: Skybridge Capital’s Anthony Scaramucci on Warren Buffett Buying Bitcoin: ‘Never Say Never’
description: Anthony Scaramucci, the founder and managing partner of Skybridge Capital, has commented on the potential for Berkshire Hathaway, the holding conglomerate founded by Warren Buffett, to buy bitcoin. While acknowledging Buffett’s negative stance on crypto, Scaramucci believes it’s still a possibility. ‘Never say never,’ stated Scaramucci. Skybridge Capital’s Anthony Scaramucci on Berkshire Hathaway Putting Money […]

title: Comedian and entertainer Trevor Noah regrets not investing in Bitcoin early
description: South African comedian and entertainer Trevor Noah regrets not investing in Bitcoin during its early stages, stating it as his life’s biggest mistake. Speaking at the Web Summit Qatar 2024 in Doha on Feb. 26, Noah shared his thoughts on technology and reflected on his missed opportunity with cryptocurrency. title: Vitalik Buterin suggests Linux as fix for Musk’s windows woes
description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has positioned Linux, the open-source operating system, as a viable solution to Elon Musk’s recent frustrations with Microsoft Windows OS. The dialogue between these influential figures underscores a growing discussion on the viability of open-source software as a mainstream alternative to proprietary operating systems. Buterin’s suggestion came in response to Musk’s […]

title: Challenges mount for Do Kwon as legal team confronts court errors
description: Amidst mounting legal battles, Terraform Labs Co-Founder Do Kwon faces uncertainty regarding his upcoming civil trial, scheduled for March 25. Recent developments, including the High Court of Podgorica’s ruling on Kwon’s extradition, have brought his potential absence on the trial’s initial day into focus. title: ETH price crosses $3.2k as stakers deposit $740m in 3 days
description: Ethereum market data analysis explores how the recent spikes in liquidate staking derivatives like Lido's (StETH) could impact ETH price rally.

title: Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta urges caution while embracing crypto in banking

title: Can PEPE Break Resistance for a New All-Time High Soon? Analyst Weigh In
description:
Pepe (PEPE) has become one of the best performers among meme coins, attracting interest from cryptocurrency lovers and traders.
